basic_information.sub_industry: Custom Software Development and Mobile App Development

headquarters.full_address: Level 2, 144 Edward Street, Brisbane City, QLD 4000

company_profile.company_description: Moonward is Australia's most trusted software development agency delivering mission-critical digital products at global scale. Based in Brisbane, this intentionally boutique team of 20+ professionals specializes in building comprehensive software solutions from mobile apps to complex web platforms, with over 100+ successful launches across diverse industries. Founded with the mission 'Building software — building futures', Moonward operates with a 100% in-house development strategy from their custom-designed office in the heart of Brisbane.

mission_vision_values.mission: Building software — building futures. To help every customer go on a journey of discovery, finding new and better ways to realise their dreams and goals.
mission_vision_values.vision: To become Australia's most trusted 100% in-house software development company delivering at global scale
mission_vision_values.philosophy: Intentionally boutique approach with tight-knit team culture focused on craftsmanship, continuous improvement, and taking clients 'to the Moon'

revenue_streams.description: Bespoke software solutions for web and mobile platforms
revenue_streams.market_focus: Enterprises and startups requiring tailored digital solutions

revenue_streams.description: iOS and Android native and cross-platform app development
Custom AI models and machine learning integration
revenue_streams.market_focus: Organizations requiring automation and data-driven insights

revenue_streams.description: Strategic guidance from concept to market launch
revenue_streams.market_focus: Non-tech founders and emerging technology companies

revenue_streams.description: Design-led user experience and interface development

target_markets: Non-tech founders seeking comprehensive digital solutions
Emerging technology startups requiring scalable platforms
service_specializations: Custom AI and Machine Learning Solutions
geographic_coverage: Sydney, New South Wales (via App Boxer acquisition)
business_model.business_model_type: Design-led software development agency with 100% in-house delivery model, focusing on long-term client relationships and referral-based growth

leadership_team.name: Andrew Owen
leadership_team.background: Founded Moonward at age 21 from his bedroom in New Zealand in 2016. Scaled the company to millions in yearly revenue with 100%+ year-on-year growth for 5 years. Has employed over 50 team members and delivered 100+ bespoke software products across 30+ industries.
leadership_team.expertise: Strategic leadership, business development, software entrepreneurship, client relationship management
leadership_team.education: Diploma of Business (2018-2019) in Business, Management, Marketing from MAX International Business College

leadership_team.name: Pia Owen
leadership_team.background: Marketing and branding specialist with education from Massey University where she received Certificate of Excellence for Branding, recognized as top 1% in the cohort. Described as 'one of the most creative and intellectual young marketing professionals'.
leadership_team.expertise: Strategic marketing, branding, creative campaign development, operational management
leadership_team.education: Massey University - Certificate of Excellence for Branding

leadership_team.name: Anson
leadership_team.expertise: Product management, strategic planning, client requirements analysis

leadership_team.name: Vanessa
leadership_team.background: Agile methodology and project delivery leadership
leadership_team.expertise: Scrum framework implementation, team coordination, delivery optimization

industry_analysis.industry_name: Australian Software Development and Custom Application Development
industry_analysis.industry_growth: Projected to reach USD 17.15 billion by 2033, with CAGR of 18.70% (2025-2033)
industry_analysis.market_size: Current market valued at approximately $13 billion, with forecasts reaching $28 billion by 2030
key_trends: Remote work transformation driving demand for collaboration tools
Government investment in digital economy infrastructure
Industry digital transformation across finance, healthcare, retail
Increased demand for AI and machine learning integration
Rising importance of cybersecurity and secure software development

competitive_landscape.market_position: Boutique premium software development agency with strong Brisbane market presence
competitive_advantages: Intentionally boutique scale with personalized service
Strong referral-based business model (90%+ work from referrals)
Custom office location in Brisbane CBD
Proven track record with 100+ successful app launches

The ability to meet in person and the cohesiveness of the team were significant advantages
More than 80% of enlisted members started to engage with the app within the first month
